name: etherealeagle
description: Link capture Chrome extension with hold-and-click interaction

scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && shx mkdir -p dist && pnpm run build:all && pnpm run copy:assets
scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:background && pnpm run build:content && pnpm run build:popup
scripts.copy:assets: shx cp src/manifest.json src/popup/popup.html src/popup/popup.css dist/
scripts.dev: pnpm run build && pnpm run build --watch
